markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tumble Behind (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2197) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 134 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You tumble under and behind your foe to catch them off guard. When you successfully [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29), the foe whose space you passed through is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the next attack you make before the end of your turn.
name: Tumble Behind (Rogue)
